author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF- Lien Hwa Industrial or affiliated company to invest no more than $15 mln in China mainland-based industrial gas firm
text:
Jan 11(Reuters) - Lien Hwa Industrial Corp
* Says it or affiliated company will invest no more than $15 million in China mainland-based firm, which will be engaged in production and sales of industrial gas
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/8Xg6FT
Further company coverage: (Beijing Headline News)
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
